Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Votes.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Title: Relates to the listing of county and city veterans' service agencies
Summary: Relates to the listing of county and city veterans' service agencies; requires the division of veterans' affairs to list information for local veterans' service agencies on its website and to provide such information in its annual report to the governor and legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the listing of county and city veterans' service agencies
